titles.title: Endometrial Cancer Research and Education Act of 2018
To amend the Public Health Service Act to expand research and education with respect to endometrial cancer, and for other purposes.
Endometrial Cancer Research and Education Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Endometrial Cancer Research and Education Act of 2018
This bill requires the National Institutes of Health and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to expand research and develop certain educational materials on endometrial cancer, respectively.
